name: Rol Crusaders: La Busqueda del Hereje
name_original: Rol Crusaders: La Busqueda del Hereje
description:
Rol Crusaders: La Busqueda del Hereje is a RPG game developed by Digital Dreams Multimedia and NoviaWork Entertainment. It came out on 01-01-1994. It was published by Tower. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Rol Crusaders: La Busqueda del Hereje is available on PC.
